name: Present Aliens
description:
As we all know, humans don't have the knowledge to build things, so the aliens must do it!

Inputs: mouse, touch or keyboards
Spacebar and clicks do actions
'r' restart the game while in game
'esc' goes back to menu while in end screen

Originally made in a  64x64 screen for #LOWREZJAM 2016. Upscaled to 320x320 for better experience.
